about_the_game:
The Void Between is an FMV style puzzle game, merging live action video with puzzling point and click gameplay in a supernatural, otherworldly setting.

What started off as a dream holiday soon descends into a nightmare when you are unable to wake from a cursed sleep. Trapped between worlds, you are now in the VOID.

What is reality and what is illusion? Can you find the clues and decipher the puzzles that will uncover the mystery to why you are here?

Will you overcome the challenges that lie ahead and return to reality, or will you be swallowed by the darkness and descend deeper into the VOID.

- Uncover clues in a real world setting,
- Overcome mysterious challenges set by a sinister stranger,
- Decipher the difference between what's real and illusion through your choices.
- How this story ends is up to you.

What started off as a dream holiday soon descends into a nightmare when you are unable to wake from a cursed sleep. Trapped between worlds, you are now in the VOID.

What is reality and what is illusion? Can you find the clues and decipher the puzzles that will uncover the mystery to why you are here?

Will you overcome the challenges that lie ahead and return to reality, or will you be swallowed by the darkness and descend deeper into the VOID.

- Uncover clues in a real world setting,
- Overcome mysterious challenges set by a sinister stranger,
- Decipher the difference between what's real and illusion through your choices.
- How this story ends is up to you.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan 10.11
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements may change as we develop the game. Thank you!

short_description: The Void Between is an FMV style puzzle game that leads you through a labyrinth of mysterious challenges and puzzling obstacles. Can you uncover the clues and decipher the puzzles that will solve the mystery to why you are here, or will you descend deeper into the darkness of the Void?
